attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the prime minister will reorganise the Financial Service Authority, 
granting it increased regulatory powers over the financial services industry
and enable the authority to use a combination of rules based, law based
and judgement based enforcement of regulatory policy.
Such enforcements being subject to review and rescission 
by external committees drawn from the public,public service, academia,
the law and the financial sector itself.
